6/ Hence, I don’t believe our accumulation & hoarding obsessions are baked into our human hardware, but rather our software. With # cryptonetworks we have the opportunity to redesign our social software towards greater distribution of wealth & power
5/ The architected scarcity of # cryptoassets brings out our socially conditioned obsession to accumulate & hoard. Yes, socially conditioned. Hunter-gatherers were egalitarian in social-structure.
4/ I’m concerned the viral nature of the # crypto markets is making the majority of new entrants focused on getting rich, whereas the original ethos of this movement was an egalitarian one.
3/ It is incumbent upon us in the # crypto space to carefully orchestrate systems that will *pre-distribute* and tend towards wealth decentralization over time.
